snippet: Lee Aronsohn, a co-creator and executive producer of "Two and a Half Men," incensed industry colleagues by suggesting that there were too many television comedies focusing on women, saying, "We're approaching peak vagina on television."
abstract: Lee Aronsohn, a co-creator and executive producer of "Two and a Half Men," incensed industry colleagues by suggesting that there were too many television comedies focusing on women, saying, "We're approaching peak vagina on television."

headline.main: 'Two and a Half Men' Co-Creator Is Rebuked For Remarks About Women
headline.print_headline: TV Executive Is Rebuked For Comments on Women
